amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress on an investigation into assertions that Iraq attempted to obtain uranium from Africa.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1197 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1197 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9205; text: CR S9205) To express the sense of Congress on an investigation into assertions that Iraq attempted to obtain uranium from Africa.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1197 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1197 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 1136.
